[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@multiversx/sdk-core](./sdk-core.md) &gt; [CodeMetadata](./sdk-core.codemetadata.md) &gt; [(constructor)](./sdk-core.codemetadata._constructor_.md)

## CodeMetadata.(constructor)

Creates a metadata object. By default, set the `upgradeable` attribute, and uset all others.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(upgradeable?: boolean, readable?: boolean, payable?: boolean, payableBySc?: boolean);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  upgradeable | boolean | _(Optional)_ Whether the contract is upgradeable |
|  readable | boolean | _(Optional)_ Whether other contracts can read this contract's data (without calling one of its pure functions) |
|  payable | boolean | _(Optional)_ Whether the contract is payable |
|  payableBySc | boolean | _(Optional)_ Whether the contract is payable by other smart contracts |
